mil3.6.9:1.2: “bhante nāgasena, yaṁ panetaṁ brūsi ‘saṁsāro’ti, katamo so saṁsāro”ti?
mil3.6.9:1.3: “Idha, mahārāja, jāto idheva marati, idha mato aññatra uppajjati, tahiṁ jāto tahiṁyeva marati, tahiṁ mato aññatra uppajjati, evaṁ kho, mahārāja, saṁsāro hotī”ti.
mil3.6.9:1.5_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, kocideva puriso pakkaṁ ambaṁ khāditvā aṭṭhiṁ ropeyya, tato mahanto
mil3.6.9:1.5_1: ambarukkho nibbattitvā phalāni dadeyya, atha so puriso tatopi pakkaṁ ambaṁ khāditvā
mil3.6.9:1.5_2: aṭṭhiṁ ropeyya, tatopi mahanto ambarukkho nibbattitvā phalāni dadeyya, evametesaṁ
mil3.6.9:1.6: evameva kho, mahārāja, idha jāto idheva marati, idha mato aññatra uppajjati, tahiṁ jāto tahiṁyeva marati, tahiṁ mato aññatra uppajjati, evaṁ kho, mahārāja, saṁsāro hotī”ti.
